ValidationRule.description: If an Animal is marked as Ready for Release, then a Release Reason is required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(aos_Animal_is_Ready_for_Release__c), aos_Animal_is_Ready_for_Release__c = TRUE, OR( ISBLANK(aos_Release_Reason__c), aos_Ownership_Confirmed__c = FALSE, ISBLANK(aos_Ownership_Confirmed_By__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When an animal is marked as ready for release, the reason for release, ownership confirmed and ownership confirmed by fields should be completed
